Notes.Text:
This update for Chromium to version 69.0.3497.92 fixes the following issues:

Security issues fixed ((boo#1108114):

- Function signature mismatch in WebAssembly
- URL Spoofing in Omnibox

The following tracked packaging issues were fixed:

- the chromium package incorrectly provied swiftshader resolvables (boo#1108175)
